answers.answer: With my first I had been having irregular contractions for 3 days. My mom, sister, & I decided we would go shopping so that I was walking & maybe speed up the contractions. We went to eat first at Arby's & as soon as we finished eating I stood up & my water broke. No noise, feeling, or sign. Just right in the middle of Arby's for all to see! It's funny now but was hilarious then I thought.

I went to the hospital with contractions. The nurse checked my cervix and said I'm at a 5 and than she said if my contractions don't pick up I'm going home. And not even 10 min after she laft the room my water broke...all I felt was a gush. When my nurse came in she said she thought it would break bc my water bag felt really tight. My son had went to the bathroom and yes this may be gross but I made my hubby look at it lol he said it was green and laughing he said that was the grossest thing I ever told him to do.

I had woke up around 3am with pretty painful contractions, I never had BH or painful contractions before so I knew that something was up. I kept having irregular painful contractions all night long, and around 10am I felt a small gush of fluid (actually thought I peed my pants, just not a whole lot), and I found out at the hospital my water had half broken, and they broke it the rest of the way at the hospital!

I had been admitted for observation due to preeclampsia, my bp was really high and I was having contractions. I was dilating slowly so they were giving me a chance to labor before starting pitocin and I felt a pop and thought I had peed on myself. I was so embarrassed that I started yelling at my mom. Lol

My water broke on friday 11/30/2012@ 7:30am, I didt have contraction or any sign of labor. I woke up like everyday to go to the bathroom , when i was crowling back to my bed i fell water comming out. I was a little scared and confuse , as i stood infront of my bed trying to figure out what had happen more water came out and more and more...then i took a shower and when to l&d they check me and i was 1  to 2 cm , they admitted me in and i had the baby almost 24hr after my water had broken , my baby was born on 12/01/2012@ 6:07 am, 38w2d, Weight 6pounds , measure 20.5 inches long . They had to give my medication to softhen my cervix , for pain i took and injection first and then took the epidural at 6cm.
Ugh, everybody is so different! I think thts the scariest part of pregnancy, you never know, theres no set way! I just know mine is gunna happen in the most embarrassing way possible! Lol

question: How did it happen? Was it out of nowhere, or had you been having contractions all day? Did you have any signs right before, like a noise or weird feeling? Any funny stories?
title: Water breaking stories?
